landing.heading: Your decentralized voting system
landing.subHeading: Millions of voters have joined. Would you like to be next?

election.notRegistered: You are not yet registered for this election. Please register as a voter before proceeding to the voting booth.
election.registered: You are registered to vote in this election. Please proceed to the voting booth to cast your vote.
election.hasVoted: Thank you for participating in this election. When the election is closed its results will be displayed below.
election.closed: The election is closed. Please scroll down to see the results.

registerVoter.text: Please enter your social security number to register as a voter. Your social security number is used to determine your eligibility to vote in this election. If you have already registered, you can also enter the mnemonic you received during the registration process by clicking on the button below.

mnemonic.text: This is your mnemonic passphrase for this election. Please write it down and store it in a safe location until you have cast your vote. You will have to reenter your passphrase when you submit your vote.

vote.text: You will cast your vote for {{name}}. Please enter the mnemonic passphrase you received after completing the registration process.
vote.warning: This action is final and can not be reversed.

validate.notEmpty: This field must not be empty.
validate.string: Some of the characters you entered are invalid.
validate.password: Minimum eight characters, at least one letter, one number and one special, upper- as well as lower case character.
validate.mnemonic: Please enter a valid mnemonic phrase.

election.uneligible: You are not eligible to vote.
election.wrongServiceNumber: Your service number does not exist.

contract.unexpired: The election is not closed, yet.
contract.uneligible: You are not eligible to vote.
